basics.name: Armando Martinez
basics.label: Undergraduate Student at Shidler College of Business
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Accounting and Management Information Systems at the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work experience.company: University of Hawaii Economic Research Organization
work experience.summarry: Assist in cost benefit analysis of implementing bio-controls for the state
highlights: Investigate, verify & validate input calculations for cost-benefit analysis execution of bio-controls of 3 invasive species
Add, update, & administer contact specialists & reference documents database of project resources for research team
Presents, summarizes & reports results of background data and information relevant to current study topic

work experience.summarry: Assist in set up for events hosted by the Duke Kahnamoku Aquatic Complex
highlights: Proactively greets, answers, and clarifies directional info and rules of the event and the pool complex to guests
Advises, trains, & assists new hires in tasks and their completion of responsibilities
Inspects. monitors and maintains pool and recreation areas for the safety of athletes and patrons
